Tribe Member

Your tribe is an extended family that shares a cultural livelihood. Each tribe has its own history, customs, and beliefs. You might follow the ways of your tribe religiously, or you might turn your back on their teachings. A person’s ties to their tribe can be as unbreakable as they are unique.

Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom, Constitution, Strength, or Dexterity increases by 1.

Provident Artisan. As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone, hide, or other materials from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size Small or larger to create one of the following items: any simple melee weapon, a blowgun, 10 blowgun needles, 10 darts, a shield, leather armor, hide armor. To use this trait, you need a blade, such as a dagger, or appropriate artisan's tools, such as leatherworker's tools. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.0HTHLWOT1SYUFQMX]{Provident Artisan}

Skills. Choose one from Athletics, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Survival.

Tools. You gain proficiency with two of the following: Leatherworker’s tools, Woodcarver’s tools, Potter’s tools, Weaver’s tools, Herbalism kit.

Languages. Common, plus one of your choice.
